title: Why should the expression of the subject and thesis be effective from the very beginning? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2a Reyna, are you really asking me why the thing you are writing about should be clear from the start? You have three good answers already, but for a fee of $500, payable to my PayPal account, I will provide an extended answer of 500 words that will give you more detail. Please let me know at what level you are studying. Best wishes for your studies.

You want to catch your readers’ attention. For this reason, you need to introduce your thesis in a way that intrigues them and makes them want to know what you are writing about. In this way, the subject of your thesis has to be presented, perhaps gradually, but from the very start.
